Class DragonHandler

java.lang.Object
team.logica_populi.dragonscore.base.registries.DragonHandler
public class DragonHandler extends Object
Registry for handling middle man communications. Also stores state information about the overall state of the program and the users state through it.

    • showMainMenu

      public void showMainMenu()
      Show the main menu scene to the user overwriting whatever scene was there before.

    • setupSession

      public void setupSession(javafx.stage.Stage stage, ResourceLocation lessonHeadersPath)
      Sets us this session with JavaFX and the back end. This should be the first thing you call on a new session
      Parameters:
      stage - The state that everything will be displayed to
      lessonHeadersPath - The path to the LessonHeader list resource that will be loaded for this session

    • start

      public void start()
      After setting up this handler, use this to start it. This will handle all the talking between the front and back end.

    • getPointsToGive

      Gets the amount of points.dat given per question answered.
      Returns:
      The amount of points.dat given

      public void setPointsToGive(int pointsToGive)
      Sets the amount of points.dat given per question answered.
      Parameters:
      pointsToGive - The amount of points.dat to give per question
